description:
NVS is a cross-platform utility for switching between different versions and forks of [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/).
    NVS will get installed in `%LOCALAPPDATA%\nvs\` and added to your `PATH`.
	 For more information about the usage please visit [NVS's docs](https://github.com/jasongin/nvs/blob/master/README.md)
summary: Node Version Switcher - A cross-platform tool for switching between versions and forks of Node.js
author: jasongin
